body: Transmission line and waveguide characteristics and components; design of RF and microwave amplifiers, oscillators, and filters; measurement techniques; design projects.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 310 , E E 330)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 432: RF and Microwave Engineering
